Title: Rebellion in Patagonia
Writer: Fernando Ayala, Osvaldo Bayer (novel), Héctor Olivera
Actors: Pedro Aleandro, Héctor Alterio, Luis Brandoni, Franklin Caicedo
Plot: In 1920, some workers of Patagonia, grouped in anarchist and socialist societies, decide to make a strike demanding better working conditions. The situation becomes unsustainable and the government sends the order is restored.
